attributes.action: commission a statue of President Franklin Delano Roosevelt to be placed on the fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: President Franklin Delano Roosevelt was one of the greatest friends of the United Kingdom and found ways to help us even before the United States of America entered the conflict of World War Two. It would be appropriate to honour his memory with a prominent statue in the centre of London. In addition, the statue would present a strong positive inspiring image of a wheelchair user.
